B

battle - Variable in class main.BattleWindow
A Battle variable which contains the instance of Battle that the user is currently fighting
Battle - Class in main
An instance of this class is used to have the user battle, can also be thought of as a battle
Battle() - Constructor for class main.Battle
A constructor that will run genMonsters()
battlelist - Variable in class main.MainWindow
A ArrayList variable used to contain the battles that the user may fight
battles - Variable in class main.MainWindow
A JButton that displays the battles available to the user
BattleTest - Class in test
 
BattleTest() - Constructor for class test.BattleTest
 
battleWindow - Variable in class main.MainWindow
 
BattleWindow - Class in main
An class which uses Java Swing to create a window, used in conjunction with an instance of Battle, that the user may fight battles
BattleWindow(MainWindow, Battle, Player, int, boolean, int) - Constructor for class main.BattleWindow
The public constructor for this class, takes a Player parameter player, an int parameter time, and a int parameter rank, as its parameters, player is used to perform operations such as getting the monster the user will use to fight, increasing the amount gold/points the user has if they win, whilst the other parameters are used to calculate the amount of gold/points the user will earn if they win the battle, and to increase the damage of enemies
brought - Variable in class main.Monster
 
broughtMonster - Variable in class main.ShopMenu
A Monster variable that contains the monster that the user has brought
btnNewButton - Variable in class main.MenuWindow
 
btnNewButton - Variable in class main.ShopMenu
A JButton which the user can press to close this window, and show the previous window
buy(Player, Items, GameWindow) - Method in class main.Shop
a method that will buy an item that the player selects
buy(Player, Monster, GameWindow) - Method in class main.Shop
a method that will buy a monster that the player selects
